LABEL: 0x37C
STRING: 「What... did you say――?」

LABEL: 0x3A4
STRING: The words Hiragino thrust before me.

LABEL: 0x3CC
STRING: The reply I finally managed to utter was merely an empty question.

LABEL: 0x414
STRING: It was no use thinking about it.

LABEL: 0x434
STRING: There was nothing to think about.

LABEL: 0x45A
STRING: Since I didn't know anything, I couldn't think in the first place.

LABEL: 0x49E
STRING: What was Hiragino saying?

LABEL: 0x4C6
STRING: Why was he asking me to kill him?

LABEL: 0x4F8
STRING: Hiragino nodded slightly and spoke in a monotone voice as if nothing had happened.

LABEL: 0x5A6
STRING: 「It's as you know.」

LABEL: 0x5C8
STRING: 「We mustn't let <COOS> reach the surface no matter what.」

LABEL: 0x67B
STRING: 「We've already suffered and sacrificed so much.」

LABEL: 0x6C5
STRING: 「Can you overrule all of it in a moment of compassion?」

LABEL: 0x798
STRING: 「You should already know the truth.」

LABEL: 0x7CC
STRING: 「We have to end it all here, in the depths of the sea where no one can see us.」

LABEL: 0x81C
STRING: 「...Make the rational choice, just like you always have.」

LABEL: 0x85F
STRING: The rational choice――

LABEL: 0x87D
STRING: Hiragino insisted on the validity of his own argument. His reasoning was sound... but it was also sophistry.

LABEL: 0x8E7
STRING: What was required now wasn't an action based on being trapped without any choices.

LABEL: 0x93D
STRING: Up until now... I hadn't had the luxury of choosing based solely on the information visible to me at that time.

LABEL: 0x983
STRING: It hadn't been purely for the sake of surviving.

LABEL: 0x9CF
STRING: The choice was now given to me.

LABEL: 0x9EF
STRING: The possibility of a specific future.

LABEL: 0xA15
STRING: What I was confronted with was the right and obligation to choose a future.

LABEL: 0xA53
STRING: What I was confronted with was a drastic "choice."

LABEL: 0xA8D
STRING: 「Even so...」

LABEL: 0xAAB
STRING: 「There's no reason for anyone to die...」

LABEL: 0xADD
STRING: A mean to escape――

LABEL: 0xAF9
STRING: I could offer no excuses.

LABEL: 0xB21
STRING: Yes, I was running away.

LABEL: 0xBB5
STRING: I was terrified of the choice.

LABEL: 0xBDD
STRING: I'd learned something from my experiences up until now.

LABEL: 0xD7E
STRING: By taking Reiri's hand, I had abandoned Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xDB8
STRING: It wasn't a simple matter of taking Tokiwa's hand.

LABEL: 0xE06
STRING: Because choosing

LABEL: 0xE9D
STRING: meant discarding something else.

LABEL: 0xECD
STRING: Opportunity cost.

LABEL: 0xF74
STRING: You couldn't determine the losses that came without a choice of your own...

LABEL: 0x10BF
STRING: 「If I were to live...」

LABEL: 0x10E1
STRING: 「Touri-kun would never agree to escape without me.」

LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x1151
STRING: 「She's... a kind and strong girl.」

LABEL: 0x1187
STRING: 「As long as I'm alive, she won't give up.」

LABEL: 0x11F0
STRING: Indeed, Touri wouldn't give up.

LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: Nomura Touri, the most good-hearted of the <SHEEP III's> survivors,

LABEL: 0x127B
STRING: would continue to hold on to hope as long as there was any of it left.

LABEL: 0x12C9
STRING: I was sure she'd be able to keep on believing beyond reason and logic.

LABEL: 0x1305
STRING: Until she saw the truth with her own eyes, she was able to cling to any dream.

LABEL: 0x1355
STRING: Even the faintest possibility was hope for her.

LABEL: 0x1395
STRING: For her――

LABEL: 0x13B5
STRING: 「...Just pretend you're dead and hide somewhere.」

LABEL: 0x13F3
STRING: 「After I escape with Touri, we'll send help back from the surface... Isn't that enough?」

LABEL: 0x14BD
STRING: 「Do you really think that ROMLES, who believes that all of <COOS> should be eradicated,

LABEL: 0x1503
STRING: would come to save me when I'm not even a passenger?」

LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: 「If we don't tell them――」

LABEL: 0x1581
STRING: 「Even if you hide it, once they see it... Once they see this light, they'll know in an instant.」

LABEL: 0x15D1
STRING: 「Not only is there no guarantee of rescue, but I could be killed on the spot.」

LABEL: 0x16AE
STRING: 「Sorry to sound so grim.」

LABEL: 0x16DE
STRING: 「But, it's the truth. We're not allowed to go to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x1729
STRING: 「Don't say it like that...」

LABEL: 0x17B9
STRING: 「Besides, how are you going to make Touri-kun believe that I'm dead?」

LABEL: 0x180C
STRING: 「Well――」

LABEL: 0x1828
STRING: No matter how desperate the situation was, no matter how many times I told her,

LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: Touri refused to believe that Reiri was dead.

LABEL: 0x1896
STRING: Maybe that was because they were twin sisters who shared the same blood.

LABEL: 0x18D4
STRING: But, if she wouldn't believe me all the same, if she wouldn't lose hope...

LABEL: 0x1922
STRING: In order to make her despair, I――

LABEL: 0x19B2
STRING: 「You should know already.」

LABEL: 0x19D6
STRING: 「She only believes what she sees.」

LABEL: 0x1A2C
STRING: 「That's why you sent her to the rescue ship, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x1A75
STRING: I couldn't help but lose my breath.

LABEL: 0x1A93
STRING: I see... Hiragino knew.

LABEL: 0x1ADB
STRING: I had sent Touri to the rescue ship where Reiri was lying―――

LABEL: 0x1B11
STRING: Hiragino was right.

LABEL: 0x1B33
STRING: In my current condition, I probably wouldn't have been able to stop her from going to the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x1B8F
STRING: But even so, that was fine.

LABEL: 0x1BC9
STRING: It was all or nothing――

LABEL: 0x1BE3
STRING: Touri, who was beside herself, was already losing her mind.

LABEL: 0x1C33
STRING: In order for her to snap out of it, she needed to see the truth.

LABEL: 0x1C75
STRING: So, I had let Touri go.

LABEL: 0x1D0F
STRING: 「You understand, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x1D2F
STRING: 「In order for you and Touri-kun to escape, I need to be dead.」

LABEL: 0x1D73
STRING: 「Even if you make it out of here, I'll be killed.」

LABEL: 0x1E1E
STRING: 「If I have no choice but to die, I want to be killed by you.」

LABEL: 0x1E79
STRING: 「...You're wrong.」

LABEL: 0x1F01
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x1F1C
STRING: 「Why do you make up all these theories and excuses,

LABEL: 0x1F4E
STRING: use other people's words, say that that it's only rational, and that it's all for other's sake...?」

LABEL: 0x1F92
STRING: 「Why are you looking for a reason to die so desperately from the outside?」

LABEL: 0x2015
STRING: 「...What's your point?」

LABEL: 0x203E
STRING: 「You just

LABEL: 0x20CC
STRING: want to die, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x20F4
STRING: I heard Hiragino gasp for air.

LABEL: 0x211E
STRING: So that was it, after all.

LABEL: 0x213C
STRING: This "reasonable death" he emphasized sounded convincing,

LABEL: 0x2176
STRING: as he kept piling up his reasons and logic.

LABEL: 0x21B0
STRING: However, it was nothing that couldn't be overcome.

LABEL: 0x21E6
STRING: If he really wanted to live,

LABEL: 0x221A
STRING: there had to be plenty of ways for him to survive and reach the surface.

LABEL: 0x22C1
STRING: The reason he didn't say anything was because he had no intention of living.

LABEL: 0x2303
STRING: He had already made his decision.

LABEL: 0x2329
STRING: He was going to die here.

LABEL: 0x23F7
STRING: 「What are you trying to achieve? Atonement?」

LABEL: 0x242D
STRING: 「Do you think God will forgive you if you die here?」

LABEL: 0x245D
STRING: 「Are you asking to die for the sake of unforgiveness?」

LABEL: 0x2501
STRING: 「Shut up!!」

LABEL: 0x251B
STRING: 「Whatever I think, it doesn't change the rationale of the choice――」

LABEL: 0x25C3
STRING: 「So what, then?」

LABEL: 0x25ED
STRING: 「You just... want to die. You just want to push the responsibility onto someone else.」

LABEL: 0x263F
STRING: 「How selfish do you have to be to construct a scenario like this?!」

LABEL: 0x274B
STRING: Hiragino pushed me against the wall again as he yelled.

LABEL: 0x2785
STRING: Before I could focus on my wobbly legs, his face was right in front of my eyes.

LABEL: 0x2837
STRING: 「Listen to me! This is the rational choice!」

LABEL: 0x286C
STRING: 「What's rational about it?! Say it with your own words!」

LABEL: 0x28BF
STRING: 「What would you know?!」

LABEL: 0x28EA
STRING: We glared at each other at a close distance.

LABEL: 0x2918
STRING: Hiragino looked like a demon.

LABEL: 0x2993
STRING: Eventually, his expression changed into a malicious smile,

LABEL: 0x29CB
STRING: similar to that of Reiri's.

LABEL: 0x2A0A
STRING: 「Listen. Let me teach an idiot like you something about the principles of disaster medicine.」

LABEL: 0x2A4E
STRING: 「Don't bring personal feelings into your diagnosis or treatment.」

LABEL: 0x2A7C
STRING: 「Prioritize those who are more likely to survive.」

LABEL: 0x2AAC
STRING: 「Abandon those who have already been deemed dead or are unable to be rescued.」

LABEL: 0x2B4B
STRING: 「If you can't do that, then you can't save lives!」

LABEL: 0x2B8A
STRING: 「You're asking me to abandon you while you're still alive――」

LABEL: 0x2C26
STRING: 「You're too naive!」

LABEL: 0x2CE9
STRING: Hiragino shoved me away.

LABEL: 0x2D1B
STRING: He stood there, leaning against the wall. Shouting this much when he was already near his limit made him look visibly exhausted.

LABEL: 0x2D73
STRING: After catching his breath, he chewed on another xylitol tablet.

LABEL: 0x2E1F
STRING: 「You say you're anguished over taking just 50 lives?」

LABEL: 0x2E63
STRING: 「The number of people I've abandoned... No.」

LABEL: 0x2E93
STRING: 「The number of people I've killed is many times more than that.」

LABEL: 0x2EED
STRING: 「I've abandoned far more people than I've saved.」

LABEL: 0x2F2D
STRING: 「Even though I said I'd save as many as I could, I've barely done anything.」

LABEL: 0x2F81
STRING: 「I've barely managed to pull a few people out of the vortex of death.」

LABEL: 0x2FC1
STRING: 「They were all alive... and I didn't save them.」

LABEL: 0x3003
STRING: 「I killed the voice inside me that begged me to save them.」

LABEL: 0x308C
STRING: 「So?」

LABEL: 0x30A6
STRING: 「You understand how petty your transgressions are now, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x30E8
STRING: 「I'm drowning in a sea of sin from the tip of my toes to the top of my head.」

LABEL: 0x312C
STRING: 「No matter what path I take, I can no longer enter the kingdom of God.」

LABEL: 0x319F
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x3235
STRING: And if your right hand causes you to fall into sin, chop it off and throw it away.

LABEL: 0x3287
STRING: It's better that you lose a part of your body than that your whole body go into hell.

LABEL: 0x32F5
STRING: The cross Hiragino carried violated his entire being.

LABEL: 0x3331
STRING: Eating away at him.

LABEL: 0x334B
STRING: He would take everything on by himself and bear responsibility for his actions in search for a path to survival.

LABEL: 0x338B
STRING: But even that way of thinking, which had helped and guided us,

LABEL: 0x33D9
STRING: was a by-product of his guilt-ridden mind.

LABEL: 0x3407
STRING: He could no longer bring himself to live on.

LABEL: 0x3437
STRING: I couldn't save Hiragino――

LABEL: 0x3512
STRING: 「Use this.」

LABEL: 0x3539
STRING: Seeing that I was at a loss for words,

LABEL: 0x357B
STRING: Hiragino took out a gun――

LABEL: 0x35A9
STRING: And several metal rods. Their tips were equipped with sharp arrowheads.

LABEL: 0x35F9
STRING: A loaded, sharp harpoon glinted at the gun's mouth, producing a vicious form.

LABEL: 0x364F
STRING: 「A speargun...?」

LABEL: 0x36DD
STRING: 「I picked it up in the warehouse earlier.」

LABEL: 0x3701
STRING: 「Apparently, it was brought here to shoot sharks or something.」

LABEL: 0x373D
STRING: 「Shoot me with this and lock the warehouse.」

LABEL: 0x379A
STRING: Hiragino tossed the speargun to me.

LABEL: 0x37D7
STRING: The weapon left his hand and rolled toward my feet, grazing my toes.

LABEL: 0x3889
STRING: The gun rolled over.

LABEL: 0x38A3
STRING: When I looked down, the handle was pointed at me...

LABEL: 0x38DB
STRING: ...It was as if it was telling me to pick it up and pull the trigger.

LABEL: 0x391B
STRING: How fitting.

LABEL: 0x39D5
STRING: Hiragino let out a scornful laugh.

LABEL: 0x3A67
STRING: 「Don't worry. If you're far enough away, you won't get any blood on you.」

LABEL: 0x3AAC
STRING: 「That's not what I'm worried about...」

LABEL: 0x3AD2
STRING: That was not the problem.

LABEL: 0x3AF8
STRING: I knew he wanted to die.

LABEL: 0x3B20
STRING: I also understood that he had to die.

LABEL: 0x3B52
STRING: Now, there was only one problem left.

LABEL: 0x3BDB
STRING: 「...If you want to die, why don't you just do it yourself?」

LABEL: 0x3C28
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0x3C49
STRING: 「Sure, I've caused the death of a lot of people.」

LABEL: 0x3C81
STRING: 「So killing one more might not change the magnitude of my crime.」

LABEL: 0x3CD1
STRING: 「But I... don't want to kill you, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x3D3F
STRING: Those were my honest feelings.

LABEL: 0x3D6F
STRING: There were times when we clashed, and there were times when we couldn't come to an understanding.

LABEL: 0x3DC1
STRING: But still, I wanted him to live.

LABEL: 0x3E54
STRING: After his surprise, Hiragino smiled sadly for a moment.

LABEL: 0x3E98
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x3EDB
STRING: 「I don't care what you think.」

LABEL: 0x3F03
STRING: 「I don't want to take any more lives. That's all.」

LABEL: 0x3F46
STRING: Hiragino's hand felt around his now-empty chest.

LABEL: 0x3F78
STRING: As if seeking the small cross that was no longer there.

LABEL: 0x3FB6
STRING: Even though he had given up on his symbol, even though he had already crossed the line,

LABEL: 0x3FFE
STRING: he couldn't abandon his values and beliefs so easily.

LABEL: 0x40B2
STRING: His morals wouldn't allow him to kill.

LABEL: 0x40DE
STRING: No matter how many lives he'd already taken,

LABEL: 0x4112
STRING: even if he could no longer enter the kingdom of God...

LABEL: 0x4138
STRING: ...In his eyes, an afterimage of the morning star he once saw was still clearly visible.

LABEL: 0x4289
STRING: 「You're the only one I can ask.」

LABEL: 0x42D9
STRING: 「Please, forgive me. For being so weak.」

LABEL: 0x4334
STRING: 「...Anything left unsaid?」

LABEL: 0x4371
STRING: 「Yukari... Take care of Momoi for me.」

LABEL: 0x43A1
STRING: 「I'm repeating myself, but now that she's contracted <Alice>, there's no saving her.」

LABEL: 0x43F1
STRING: 「I want her to suffer as little as possible.」

LABEL: 0x4436
STRING: 「Suffer? What do you――」

LABEL: 0x4466
STRING: I felt the weight of the multiple arrows he gave me.

LABEL: 0x4492
STRING: If all I had to do was shoot Hiragino, one would have been enough.

LABEL: 0x4534
STRING: 「Yes... That's my last wish.」

LABEL: 0x456D
STRING: Hiragino bowed his head as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x45D6
STRING: 「I'm sorry for being so selfish.」

LABEL: 0x4602
STRING: 「But, you're the only one I can rely on.」

LABEL: 0x4627
STRING: That was the end of his story.

LABEL: 0x4655
STRING: 「You really are selfish...」

LABEL: 0x4677
STRING: 「Are you going to force this scenario you wrote on me?」

LABEL: 0x46BB
STRING: I meant to sound provocative.

LABEL: 0x46E5
STRING: It was supposed to be my final act of resistance.

LABEL: 0x470F
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x4727
STRING: My mind was made up.

LABEL: 0x4753
STRING: Hiragino raised his head.

LABEL: 0x47DD
STRING: 「Do you understand now?」

LABEL: 0x4804
STRING: 「Understand what, you idiot?」

LABEL: 0x4833
STRING: 「Yeah, that's right.」

LABEL: 0x48B0
STRING: 「We don't understand anything... Neither of us do.」

LABEL: 0x48E9
STRING: His expression was soft, and there was a hint of a smile on his lips.

LABEL: 0x492F
STRING: A moment later, he spoke with a somber expression.

LABEL: 0x49C7
STRING: 「Let me make one thing clear.」

LABEL: 0x49EB
STRING: 「Everyone thinks the world they see is the truth.」

LABEL: 0x4A35
STRING: 「But there are always blind spots.」

LABEL: 0x4A63
STRING: 「Don't forget the existence of things you can't see.」

LABEL: 0x4A9D
STRING: 「Don't believe in only what you're seeing―――」

LABEL: 0x4AD7
STRING: 「That's the one thing you must never forget.」

LABEL: 0x4B0C
STRING: 「...You talk a lot for someone in their last moments.」

LABEL: 0x4B38
STRING: 「Are you starting to feel regret after coming this far?」

LABEL: 0x4B99
STRING: I picked up the speargun.

LABEL: 0x4BC5
STRING: It weighed heavy, but it was many times lighter than life itself.

LABEL: 0x4C03
STRING: I pointed it at Hiragino――

LABEL: 0x4C27
STRING: 「I have my own truth. I'm free to do as I please.」

LABEL: 0x4CE1
STRING: ――And pulled the trigger.
